S.FORM: Chris Andersen nalecuhan i Long Beach, California, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. u siwkay niza u tatama, u Amilika a tademaw. takalaw ciniza. u kawaw niza sa u mimaliay a undukay. 7 bulad 7 demiad, 1978 a mihca, Chris Andersen, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players NBA NBA .
